segments.text: Yes , they notify me to work next week .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Where on earth will you work in ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It is a pretty big mechanical company . I am assigned to work in the assembly shop .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: How long will you work a day ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: My working hours aren ’ t fixed , sometimes I do the day shift , sometimes the night shift . In all , about 8 hours .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: How will you get your pay ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: My wage depends on production results .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What sort of welfare facilities does your company provide ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: The company provides labor insurance for all employees , as well as fine retirement policy .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: There is the company union , but it really shares the same aims as the management .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: So you must consider dearly before you go to work .
segments.speaker: S1
